targets.expr: sum(  pulsar_subscription_msg_rate_out{      cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"  }) by (cluster, namespace, topic, subscription)
sum(  pulsar_subscription_msg_throughput_out{    cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"  }) by (cluster, namespace, topic, subscription)
sum(pulsar_subscription_back_log{cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"}) by (cluster, namespace, topic, subscription)
sum(pulsar_subscription_delayed{cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"}) by (cluster, namespace, topic, subscription)

100*sum(pulsar_storage_backlog_size{cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"}) by (cluster, namespace, topic)/sum(pulsar_storage_backlog_quota_limit{cloud_streamnative_io_cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", topic=~"$topic"}) by (cluster, namespace, topic)

panels.description: Rate of writes into storage (can be lower than publish rate, when batching is enabled)
panels.title: Storage Write Rate
